content.body:
As someone who is not a member of TC39 or ECMA, where should I start if I want to make a new proposal? Would it be better to start by writing a document using the template below and then ask someone here to review it?

https://github.com/tc39/template-for-proposals
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text:
As someone who is not a member of TC39 or ECMA, where should I start if I want to make a new proposal? Would it be better to start by writing a document using the template below and then ask someone here to review it?

https://github.com/tc39/template-for-proposals

content.body: yeah, you can start authoring a proposal and ask someone to champion it
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: yeah, you can start authoring a proposal and ask someone to champion it

content.body: Also see how-we-work for a practical guide (the template does not include this)
maybe a faster place to start/iterate would be the discourse
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: maybe a faster place to start/iterate would be the discourse
